author: Brian Johnson
title: Perkins+Will unveils new office renderings
text:
Apartment Sales Tracker Home / Brief / Perkins+Will unveils new office renderings Perkins+Will’s new workplace at the IDS Center in downtown Minneapolis will “give our designers the most flexibility to innovate with clients,” said Dave Dimond, the company’s design director. (Submitted rendering: Perkins+Will) Perkins+Will unveils new office renderings By: Brian Johnson September 21, 2015 6:36 pm 0 The Minneapolis office of Perkins+Will has released images of its future workplace at the IDS Center in downtown Minneapolis. The space, which overlooks Nicollet Mall and the Crystal Court from the third floor of the office tower, will replace Perkins+Will’s existing home on the second and third floors of 84 10th St. S., the company said ...
